name: Slime Extermination
description:
The slime army is attempting to take over the city. Our only defence is one turret which takes damage whilst moving. Can you protect the city until the slime's coup is over? Or will the city become ravaged by the slimes in their endless conquest for land?

CREDITS

Sunglocto - Programming and art

hairbobble  - Absolutely amazing music

CONTROLS

Hold spacebar to shoot

Move the mouse to aim

Press R to reload (when your ammo is 0)

Moving your turret decreases your health - so keep your aim steady.
